Reference

All functions

available_agents()

List Available RL Agents

available_agents_internal()

List Available RL Agents

rl_action_simulate()

Simulate an RL Agent's Action

rl_action_simulate(<epsilonGreedy>)

Simulate an Action with a 'Epsilon-Greedy' Choice Policy

rl_action_simulate(<greedy>)

Simulate an Action with a 'Greedy' Choice Policy

rl_action_simulate(<softmax>)

Simulate an Action with a 'Softmax' Choice Policy

rl_arms_define()

Define an RL Arm

rl_arms_get_outcome()

Get Arm's Outcome based on its Probability and Reward Structure

rl_arms_get_structure()

Retrieve the List of Arm Definitions

rl_get_learned_values()

Get RL Agent's Simulated Learned Values

rl_get_learned_values(<kArmedBandit>)

Get 'kArmedBandit' Agent's Learned Value Data

rl_get_learned_values(<tdrlConditioning>)

Get 'tdrlConditioning' Agent's Learned Value Data

rl_get_pe_data()

Get RL Agent's Simulated Prediction Errors

rl_get_pe_data(<kArmedBandit>)

Get 'kArmedBandit' Agent's Prediction Error Data

rl_get_pe_data(<tdrlConditioning>)

Get 'tdrlConditioning' Agent's Prediction Error Data

rl_new_agent()

Initialize a Reinforcement Learning Agent

rl_new_agent(<kArmedBandit>)

Initialize a 'tdrlConditioning' Agent

rl_new_agent(<tdrlConditioning>)

Initialize a 'tdrlConditioning' Agent

rl_set_arms()

Setup an agent's Arm Structure

rl_set_arms(<kArmedBandit>)

Set the Arm Structure for 'kArmedBandit' Agent

rl_set_cues()

Setup an agent's Cue Structure

rl_set_cues(<tdrlConditioning>)

Set the Cue Structure for 'tdrlConditioning' Agent

rl_set_policy()

Setup an agent's Action-Selection Policy

rl_set_policy(<kArmedBandit>)

Set the Action-Selection Policy for a 'kArmedBandit' Agent

rl_set_reinforcements()

Setup an agent's Reward Structure

rl_set_reinforcements(<tdrlConditioning>)

Set the Reward Structure for 'tdrlConditioning' Agent

rl_simulate_agent()

Simulate the RL Agent

rl_simulate_agent(<kArmedBandit>)

Simulate the 'kArmedBandit' Agent

rl_simulate_agent(<tdrlConditioning>)

Simulate the 'tdrlConditioning' Agent

simulate_prpt_iaps()

Simulate Random Choices on the PRPT or IAPS task

zeros()

Create a zero matrix.
